segment.source: The user may also choose between a light or dark theme for the system.

segment.source: Some apps choose to change their theme based on the user’s preference, while others opt out.
segment.target: Some apps choose to change their theme based on the user’s preference, while others opt out.

segment.source: Apps using light theme are for scenarios involving productivity apps.
segment.target: Apps using light theme are for scenarios involving productivity apps.

segment.source: Examples would be the suite of apps available with Microsoft Office.
segment.target: Examples would be the suite of apps available with Microsoft Office.

segment.source: Light theme affords the ease of reading long lengths of text in conjunction with prolonged periods of time-at-task.
segment.target: Light theme affords the ease of reading long lengths of text in conjunction with prolonged periods of time-at-task.

segment.source: Dark theme allows more visible contrast of content for apps that are media centric or scenarios where users are presented with an abundance of videos or imagery.
segment.target: Dark theme allows more visible contrast of content for apps that are media centric or scenarios where users are presented with an abundance of videos or imagery.
